ValidationRule.description: REQ0520627 - MyCustomers should not be allowing any profile (except SSSW Admin) to modify properties of the case once Comp case is in the Status of : "Awaiting Money Order Number".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( Service_Value__c ) && ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Awaiting Money Order Number') && NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name , "Administrator") ) && NOT( $Permission.SSSW_CP_Admin)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Modifying this field is not allowed at this current status.
